object-oriented technology
pinyin: mian4 xiang4 dui4 xiang4 de5 ji4 shu4

definition: object oriented language
pinyin: mian4 xiang4 dui4 xiang4 yu3 yan2

definition: connection-oriented

sentences.english: Accessibly several different versions, oriented to different circle of tasks.
sentences.chinese: 通俗易懂的几个不同版本，面向不同圈子的任务。

sentences.english: About 20 percent of the vaccine will be reserved for essential workers and the rest go to the public on a voluntary basis.
sentences.chinese: 有20%的疫苗将供收储，其馀面向公众自愿接种。

sentences.english: It looks like the momentum is growing for a shift towards stream-oriented approach to UI.
sentences.chinese: 看起来UI转向面向数据流方式的势头渐劲。
面向对象说话的思想本事。

sentences.english: We must orient our work to the needs of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须使我们的工作面向人民的需要。

sentences.english: JDMPLC-1 is a new programable logic controller, for modern automatic control systems.
sentences.chinese: 是一种面向现代控制系统的微型可编程控制器。

sentences.english: Design for Disassembly and Recycling (DFD&R) is the important content of Green Design.
sentences.chinese: 面向拆卸与回收的设计是绿色设计的重要内容。

sentences.english: The object-oriented logical program design may unify these two kind of designs the merit.
sentences.chinese: 面向对象的逻辑程序设计可结合这两种设计的优点。

sentences.english: The system adopts object-oriented design method by VB6.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用面向对象的设计方法，运用VB6。

sentences.english: The wind tower is a system for capturing air currents with openings at the top facing the prevailing winds.
sentences.chinese: 风塔是一种顶部开口，面向主风，捕捉气流的系统。

sentences.english: But in the case of oop programing there are no objects in machine language.
sentences.chinese: 但在面向对象编程中有没有对象的情况下机器语言。

sentences.english: Finally, various geographic characteristic oriented knowledge rules were described.
sentences.chinese: 最后阐述各种面向地理特征的制图综合知识规则。

sentences.english: When putt in place, the block stones shall be bigger-face up with joints staggered.
sentences.chinese: 摆放块石时，石料应大面向上，缝隙相互错开。

sentences.english: Of course, it could also be an object-oriented database.
sentences.chinese: 当然还可以是面向对象的数据库。

sentences.english: It dovetails with existing task oriented training to provide the framework for overall actions.
sentences.chinese: 能够配合现有的培训任务，为面向行动的总体框架。

sentences.english: Ruby, like other object-oriented languages, supports polymorphism.
sentences.chinese: 像其他面向对象语言一样，支持多态性。
